Desc.eng: I’ve heard that you are heading for the Gallowsbog. Tread carefully on the old battlefield! It’s still haunted by some of those lurking, rusty hunter-machines. Did you know that the mayor put a blood price on those things?
Blood price? Does that mean that we’ll get paid for this for once?
Thank you for the advice. Rest assured, I’d destroy these machines even for free…. and hopefully my companion didn’t hear that.
